job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Position: Sr. Machine Learning EngineerLocation: Palo Alto, CA- Remote until Covid-19 but preferred Locals to CADuration: Contract or Contract to Hire&nbsp;About the RoleThe Sr. Machine Learning Engineer position is responsible for researching, building, and maintaining Machine Learning models for a large-scale distributed cloud platform to deliver application privacycapabilities. The ideal candidate is also expected to mentor and work with a remarkably high performing software team&nbsp;ResponsibilitiesAs a senior staff member of a fast-growing early-stage startup, the Sr. ML Engineer will be accountable for Machine Learning and AI of the Data Secrets’ platform:  - Research, build and maintain Machine Learning models for highly scalable, performant and available platform   
  - Integrate new data sources and workflows into the platform   
  - Build and support machine learning workflows on the platform   
  - Build distributed computing frameworks to process data   
  - Performs data analysis required to troubleshoot data related issues   
  - Be an innovator and lead development of Intellectual Property of Data Secrets   
  - Drive innovation at the junction of cloud computing, distributed systems, data privacy and data sciencesWork closely with the product management team, and drive the ML technology & architectural aspects of the product roadmap   
  - Work closely with customers to build use cases and requirements for well-integrated solutions   
  - Align the product with industry security standards, data privacy regimes' compliance   
  - requirements and certifications for each of the focus industry verticals.   
  - Evangelize Data Secrets in industry-wide AI and data privacy forums
